content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Hello Haoyu Wang,

Let's talk about the rental price. I want to rent it out for the highest price possible. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I am a student and I am looking for a place with the lowest possible rent. How about 300 Euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is too low for my liking. I am looking for the highest possible rent. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, Mister Schmidt. How about 400 Euros per month? It's a fair price for an apartment of this size and location in Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 400 Euros is still too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. How about 450 Euros per month? It's a reasonable price for an apartment of this size and location in Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 450 Euros is still too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. How about 500 Euros per month? It's a good price for an apartment of this size and location in Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 500 Euros is still too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, Mister Schmidt. How about 550 Euros per month? It's a great price for an apartment of this size and location in Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 550 Euros is still too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
